text:
배달음식 시켜두고 저는 잠들어서 벨 울리면
형은 자다가 방에서 나와서까지 나가서
벨 꺼주고
아침에 픽업할 때
잠에서 못 깨서 맨날 늦는 저를
짜증 한번 안 내고 기다려주고
가끔 숙소에서 숨어있다가
귀신인 척 놀랠 때면 진짜 가만 안 두고 싶지만
(머리가 길어서 진짜 귀신같아 보임)
혼자 밥 먹을 때는 왜 혼자 먹냐고 앞에 있어주고
가끔 제 고향 친구나 동료 들을 데려오는 날에는
항상 반갑게 맞이해주고
옆에서 자리해 주면서
저희 얘기를 꼭 들어주고 자기 방으로 들어가요
그래서 제 주변에서도 정한이형을 다 좋아해요
주기적으로 정한이형 안부를 묻고
보고 싶다고 찾아오는 사람도 많답니다ㅎ
정한이형 복무 시작일이랑
제 출국 날이 하필 겹쳐서
인사를 못하고 가서
따로 편지를 남기는데
진짜 완전히 떠나는 것도 아닌데
이상하게 뭉클하더라고요
진짜 돌아보면 고마운 게 너무 많고
또 미안한 것도 많아서 그런가 봐요
편지에는 같이 사는 동안 많이 많이 고마웠고
또 앞으로도 서로 또 좋은 추억 쌓으면서 살아가자고,
형 없는 동안 착하게 멤버들이랑 사이좋게 지내면서
씩씩하게 잘 활동하고 있겠다고 했어요
콘서트 연습하는데 의자에 앉아서
축 늘어진 정한이형이 안보여서
너무 허전하네요
그러다가 짜글이 같은 거
시켜먹고 힘 좀 내나 싶더니
얼마 못 가는 형.. 인데
이번 콘서트 연습이 너무 힘들어서
같이 했으면 정한이형 또
체력적으로 진짜 정말 힘들었을까 봐
한편으로는 다행인 거 같기도 하고..
trans:
If I order delivery food and fall asleep, and the doorbell rings
My brother even gets out of bed and comes out of his room to go outside
Turn off the bell and
When he picks up in the morning
Me, who can never wake up on time and is always late.
He waited patiently without a single complain
Sometimes, he hides away in the lodging
When he pretends to be a ghost to scare me, I honestly just can't let it slide, but
(With his long hair, he really does look like a ghost)
When I eat alone, he sits in front of me and asks why I'm eating alone
On days when I sometimes brings my hometown friends or colleagues over,
He always greets them warmly
He sits next to us
He always listens to our conversation and then goes into his room
That's why everyone around me likes brother Jeong-han
They regularly ask about brother Jeong-han's well-being
There are many people who come to visit because they miss him. hehe
Brother Jeong-han's service start date and
My departure date just happens to coincide with it
I couldn't greet to him
So, I leave a letter separately
I'm not really leaving for good, though
It felt strangely emotional
Looking back, there’s so much to be grateful for
Maybe it's because there's also so much I feel sorry for
In the letter, I wrote that I was really grateful for all the time we spent together
I also wrote that we should continue making good memories together in the future,
I asked them to be good and get along well with the members while you're not around
I told them that you'll be actively doing well
I was sitting on a chair while practicing for the concert
I couldn't see the slouched brother Jeong-han
It feels so empty
Then, something like jjageulyi
I thought having some food would help him regain some energy, but
But he’s a brother who can't last long
The practice for this concert is so tough
If we had done it together, brother Jeong-han would have
I’m worried it might have been really physically exhausting for him
On the other hand, I feel relieved..
